result.title: Software Toolkit - Hazard prediction based on multi-modal perception
result.description: Software Toolkit that supports humans in fast and reliable situation analysis. This will include algorithms for the complex interpretation of sensor sources in order to detect and predict hazards.

result.title: Requirements book and human factors best practice guidance - Final Version
result.description: The deliverable reports on the results of task T1.1. It collects the multi-dimensional requirements (organisational, business, technical, ethical, legal, etc.) for the A4BLUE solution and a guidance report – advising partners on how to integrating human factors into the scenario design based on the user requirements.

result.title: Data management plan
result.description: The document will describe the data management plan, taking into account the following aspects:- The handling of research data during & after the end of the project- What data will be collected, processed and/or generated- Which methodology & standards will be applied- Whether data will be shared/made open access and- How data will be curated & preserved (including after the end of the project).
